column1: Israel, whose new ambassador in Washington had complained to the press on February 14th that America was giving Israel the ' runaround ' on housing aid for Soviet immigrants ( the administration wanted to be sure that $ 400 m in loan guarantees, now agreed, would not be used to settle immigrants in the West Bank ).
